description: Senior Software Engineer and Microsoft MVP for Windows Embedded / Internet of Things who has been working on Microsoft technologies since 2006 with all .Net Frameworks (Micro, Compact and Desktop); he has been developing on embedded and mobile systems (based on Windows CE, WindowsPhone/Android and RTOS) since 2010, using C/C++, C# and Java. Focused on IoT and M2M communication. Member of DotNetCampania, TinyCLR.it and Embedded101 communities. Technical writer and owner of some open source projects on CodePlex and GitHub
